hots.instance¶

hots.instance¶

Define the Instance class, which represents the problem we are facing, with its data, information, parameters. Provide Instance-related methods.

class hots.instance.Instance(path: str, config: Dict)[source]¶

Description of a problem instance.

time¶

total time of dataset

sep_time¶

time separating analysis and evaluation period

window_duration¶

duration of time window for clustering

  • config – Configuration dict from config file
